text: Our clinical colleagues in Infectious Diseases @Unispital_USZ who treat #COVID19 patients have started to get their first #vaccine shots (#Comirnaty; #PfizerBioNTech), incl Dr @irene_abela, an MD/PhD, who also conducts basic research on #SARSCoV2 antibodies here @UZH_Virology https://t.co/qRod9u4ptI
